review.title: “Good Place to Work”
review.pros: Pros – Good benefits, atmosphere, and employees. Objectives are clearly outlined and expected to be met. There is plently of room for questions to be asked, and lessons to be learned.
review.cons: Cons – Not a lot of room for career advancement. This is a small firm, but a great place for someone who is just starting out in the tax or audit world. Would also be an ideal place for someone who is looking to retire.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
